--template--: papavisor copies the defaults and overwrites them with the settings here.

--template--.enabled: Whatever to enable this project, defaults to true.
--template--.url: Obviously overwrite the url from the defaults
--template--.types: As example set startsecs for all instances to 10 secs.
--template--.programs: For whatever reason instance2 is slow so set its startsecs to 30 secs.
